title: ClickTight Convertibles: Installing the Anti-Rebound Bar
description:
The anti-rebound bar is for use with Canadian Britax ClickTight infant-child car seats (Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight). The anti-rebound bar is a separate component that should be attached to the front of the Britax infant-child car seat for rear-facing installations. The anti-rebound bar MUST be removed when the car seat is installed forward-facing. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

NOTE:Use of the anti-rebound bar is required in Canada. In the United States it is optional. In Canada the anti-rebound bar is included with the purchase of the seat. It is an accessory in the United States.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
The anti-rebound bar is for use with Canadian Britax ClickTight infant-child car seats (Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight). The anti-rebound bar is a separate component that should be attached to the front of the Britax infant-child car seat for rear-facing installations. The anti-rebound bar MUST be removed when the car seat is installed forward-facing. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

NOTE:Use of the anti-rebound bar is required in Canada. In the United States it is optional. In Canada the anti-rebound bar is included with the purchase of the seat. It is an accessory in the United States.

transcripts: Open the click tight by pushing forward on the indentation on the click type key rotate the key clockwise and lift the front panel of the seat. Pull back on the shell cover behind the red marker and locate the open end of the structure tube . Insure the anti rebound bar is in the correct orientation with the notch of the end facing up. Insert one end of the anti rebound bar into the tube. Repeat on the other side. Place the child seat rear facing in the vehicle seat and install the child seat according to the installation instructions. Closing the click tight will completely secure the entire rebound bar. The anti rebound bar must be removed for forward facing installations. To remove the entire rebound bar with the click tight open grasp the anti rebound bar and pull up and away from the child seat. Once removed install the click tight forward facing according to the installation instructions.
